dataModel.title: Prototype Veg Plots Database Component Description: CitationContributor
dataModel.author: J. Harris

entity.entitySummary: This table is the intersection between citation and party and relates the role a party has had in a citation(s).

attribute.attDefinition: Database assigned value for a uniquely identifying a particular party with a particular citation.

attribute.attNotes: Foreign key into the citation table.
attribute.attDefinition: This key provides a link to a citation.

attribute.attNotes: Foreign key into the party table.
attribute.attDefinition: This key provides a link to a party.
This is the role that a particular party had in a particular citation.
